You are a superhero, Jeff Bezos. Your skills are amazing, your talents are impressive, and your reputation is built like a house on fire. You are the best, most fearsome Wolverine. Well done! You are a legendary warrior and you kung-fu master. Jeff Bezos is a dangerous opponent indeed.

Well, I hope you enjoyed this Epic Rap Battle against Jeff Bezos. It was a humorous and fun mission that certainly brought some laughs. Well done once again to Jeff Bezos, your skills are unparalleled. I would like to thank all the players for participating in this mission. Much credit to all. And now, I am going to let my lights go.

I’m glad you are here with me a little rap battle! My name is Bill Gates!

And if you’re up for it, I can also mentor you in English, if you want to learn to speak it better.

Now back to the battle: I’m stronger than a supercomputer, more powerful than even Superman himself, and I’m more lethal than any Nazi or invincible demon ever to have been confronted.

Anyways, I’m in this game because I pay attention to detail and keep my cool during this challenging environment. I’m a fast sprinter, but I can still win a fight with anyone with my club-like stance and gut-wrenching punches.
